= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Face sensory data* (face-sensory-data)
   * *Face - face skin* (face-skin -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG]): sensory fibers from the skin
   * *Face - parotid skin* (face-parotid-skin -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG]): facial skin over the parotid gland
  * *Face scalp muscles* (face-scalp-muscles)
   * *Face - corrugator supercilii muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> face-corrugator-supercilii-muscle): wrinkles forehead
   * *Face - depressor supercilii muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> face-depressor-supercilii-muscle): depression of eyebrow
   * *Face - frontalis muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> face-frontalis-muscle): raises the eyebrows
   * *Face - occipitalis muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> face-occipitalis-muscle): moves the scalp back
  * *Face upper lip muscles* (face-upper-lip-muscles)
   * *Face - levator labii superioris muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> face-levator-labii-superioris-muscle): dilates the nostril; elevates the upper lip and wing of the nose
   * *Face - procerus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> face-procerus): dilates the nostril; elevates the upper lip and wing of the nose
   * *Face - zygomaticus minor muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> zygomaticus-minor-muscle): elevates upper lip
  * *Face lower lip muscles* (face-lower-lip-muscles)
   * *Face - platysma muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> face-platysma-muscle): draws the corners of the mouth inferiorly and widens it (as in expressions of sadness and fright). Also draws the skin of the neck superiorly when teeth are clenched
   * *Face - depressor labii inferioris muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> depressor-labii-inferioris-muscle): depress the lower lip
   * *Face - risorius muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> risorius-muscle): assist with pulling the lower lip downward and help to tighten the skin over the chin
   * *Face - mentalis muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> mentalis-muscle): elevates and wrinkles skin of chin, protrudes lower lip
   * *Face - transverse muscle of the chin* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> transverse-chin-muscle): assist with pulling the lower lip downward and help to tighten the skin over the chin
  * *Face surround and mouth corners muscles* (face-surround-corner-muscles)
   * *Face - orbicularis oris muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> orbicularis-oris-muscle): pucker the lips
   * *Face - zygomaticus major muscle, buccal* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> zygomaticus-major-muscle-buccal): draws angle of mouth upward and laterally
   * *Face - zygomaticus major muscle, proper* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> zygomaticus-major-muscle-proper): draws angle of mouth upward and laterally
   * *Face - levator anguli oris muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> levator-anguli-oris-muscle): smile (elevates angle of mouth)
   * *Face - depressor anguli oris muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> depressor-anguli-oris-muscle): depresses angle of mouth
